node.excerpt: Contentment lighting up her face, Leaning in all innocent like, Pollinated with happiness, Live for little moments like this, On a sleepy…
The bustle down some local haunt, Underage girls with nought to flaunt, Over vocal smoking a blunt, Calling every wise guy a @#?%, Regulars…
Calling it home where bodies meet, Holding tight to tranquillity, Two breaths tied to but one movement, Soothing skin acts to cancel heat…
